title: Create shoe showcase website with contact information

requirements.text: Create a simple, elegant landing page showcasing the luxury shop brand and shoe collection

quotes: Make a website for shoes store

acceptanceCriteria: Landing page displays shop name 'luxury shop' prominently
Design emphasizes visual showcase over functionality

requirements.text: Display a gallery of famous, stylish shoe images in an attractive grid or carousel layout

quotes: With famous , style pics of shoes

acceptanceCriteria: Multiple shoe images are displayed in a visually appealing format
Images are high-quality and showcase shoes as the focal point
Gallery layout is responsive and works on mobile devices

requirements.text: Display phone number 9079846195 prominently as a contact method
acceptanceCriteria: Phone number 9079846195 is clearly visible on the page
On mobile devices, clicking the number initiates a phone call

requirements.text: Add WhatsApp contact link for number 9079846195 that opens WhatsApp when clicked
acceptanceCriteria: WhatsApp icon or button is visible on the page
Clicking the WhatsApp contact opens WhatsApp with number 9079846195
Link works on both mobile and desktop devices

requirements.text: Display the generated luxury shop logo prominently in the header or hero section

quotes: Shop name ..... luxury shop ....with a logo of shop

acceptanceCriteria: Logo is rendered from the generated image asset
Logo appears in a prominent position (header or hero)
Logo is appropriately sized and maintains quality

requirements.text: Apply a sophisticated, luxury-focused visual theme with elegant typography, refined color palette (avoid blue and purple unless naturally fitting luxury aesthetic), and spacious layout that emphasizes high-end fashion photography
acceptanceCriteria: Color scheme conveys sophistication and luxury
Layout provides ample whitespace around images
Overall aesthetic matches high-end fashion brands

constraints: Do not include any pricing information or price displays
Do not implement shopping cart or e-commerce functionality
Do not add product purchase or checkout features

required: Elegant luxury shop logo for a high-end shoe store, sophisticated design with clean lines (luxury-shop-logo.dim_400x400.png)
Stylish high-fashion women's heels on white background, professional product photography (shoe-heels.dim_800x800.png)
Luxury men's leather dress shoes, side angle, professional lighting (shoe-dress.dim_800x800.png)
Designer sneakers, modern street style, clean background (shoe-sneakers.dim_800x800.png)
Elegant women's boots, full view, fashion photography style (shoe-boots.dim_800x800.png)
Premium leather loafers, professional product shot (shoe-loafers.dim_800x800.png)
